source: Original content based on AWS Developer documentation

questions.title: AWS_DVA_LAMBDA_001
questions.question: You are developing a Lambda function that processes S3 events. Which environment variable contains the AWS request ID?
questions.explanation: AWS_REQUEST_ID contains the unique request ID for each Lambda invocation.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_DYNAMODB_001
questions.question: Which DynamoDB operation allows you to update an item only if a specific condition is met?
questions.explanation: UpdateItem with ConditionExpression enables conditional updates based on attribute values.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_API_GATEWAY_001
questions.question: You need to implement request throttling in API Gateway. Which feature should you configure?
questions.explanation: Usage Plans allow you to set throttle limits and quotas for API consumers.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_CODEDEPLOY_001
questions.question: Which deployment type in CodeDeploy shifts traffic gradually from old to new version?
questions.explanation: Canary deployment gradually shifts traffic (e.g., 10% then 100%) allowing monitoring before full rollout.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_SQS_001
questions.question: What is the maximum message retention period for SQS standard queue?
questions.explanation: SQS can retain messages for up to 14 days with configurable retention period.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_XRAY_001
questions.question: Which AWS service provides distributed tracing for debugging microservices?
questions.explanation: X-Ray provides end-to-end tracing of requests across distributed applications.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_COGNITO_001
questions.question: Which Cognito feature allows users to sign in with Google or Facebook?
questions.explanation: User Pools support federation with social identity providers like Google, Facebook, Amazon.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_STEPFUNCTIONS_001
questions.question: You need to orchestrate multiple Lambda functions with error handling. Which service should you use?
questions.explanation: Step Functions coordinate multiple AWS services into serverless workflows with built-in error handling and retry logic.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_SECRETS_001
questions.question: Which service should you use to store and rotate database credentials automatically?
questions.explanation: Secrets Manager provides automatic rotation of database credentials and secrets.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_CLOUDFORMATION_001
questions.question: In CloudFormation, what happens if a stack update fails?

answers.text: Stack is left in UPDATE_FAILED state
Stack automatically rolls back to previous state

questions.explanation: CloudFormation automatically rolls back to the previous stable state if an update fails.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_EVENTBRIDGE_001
questions.question: Which AWS service allows you to route events from AWS services to Lambda functions based on rules?
questions.explanation: EventBridge routes events from AWS services, SaaS apps, and custom applications to targets based on rules.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_KINESIS_001
questions.question: You need to process real-time streaming data with sub-second latency. Which service should you use?
questions.explanation: Kinesis Data Streams enables real-time processing of streaming data with sub-second latency.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_ELASTICACHE_001
questions.question: Which ElastiCache engine supports data structures like sorted sets and hashes?
questions.explanation: Redis supports advanced data structures including strings, hashes, lists, sets, and sorted sets.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_IAM_001
questions.question: Which IAM policy type defines maximum permissions that an identity-based policy can grant?
questions.explanation: Permissions boundaries set the maximum permissions that identity-based policies can grant to an entity.

questions.title: AWS_DVA_CODEPIPELINE_001
questions.question: Which CodePipeline action type runs automated tests?
questions.explanation: The Test action runs automated tests using services like CodeBuild or third-party tools.
